verses.refrain: Then trim your lamps, my brethren dear, Then trim your lamps with godly fear; The Master's coming draweth near, Let every lamp be burning.
verses.verse: Let every lamp be burning bright, The darkest hour is nearing; The darkest hour of earth's long night, Before the Lord's appearing.
Though thousands calmly slumber on, The last great message spuring, We'll rest our living faith upon His promise of returning.
Then let good works with faith appear, To help the world around us; Obedience bring the blessing near When faith has firmly bound us.
